title: 'It's more than a job' - Bowles furious at Buccaneers after defeat
subtitle: Tampa Bay Buccaneers head coach Todd Bowles lashes out at his players in a explosive rant after a fifth loss in six games against the Atlanta Falcons, which drops them to second in the NFC South division and puts their play-off chances at risk.
full_text: Tampa Bay Buccaneers head coach Todd Bowles lashes out at his players in a explosive rant after a fifth loss in six games against the Atlanta Falcons, which drops them to second in the NFC South division and puts their play-off chances at risk.
